item.description:
Peut-etre un petit presentation sur les films francais qui seront montres dans notre region.

I am feeling helpless regarding the suffering of our French-speaking fellow humans in Haiti. If anyone would care to contribute as a group, I would like to suggest that we donate generously to Doctors Without Borders to help with medical supplies. I will bring a box for donations that night.

Et apres? The Cheesecake Factory at Blue Back Square is open late for those who would like to enjoy a sweet treat- it's Mozart's birthday!

group.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French

item.name: West Hartford Groupe de French 4th Wednesday
